name: Underground Quest (Gusboh)
description:
You are a digger that has fallen into a cave where the only escape is finding three crystals to be placed in a door that lead to the outside.

Important note! This is a a polished version of the original game that can be found on IndieDB. This version does not contain any additional levels or features. The reason the polished one is uploaded here approx. 3 years after initial release is that the lead in our group didn't deem it "necessary" to update it. But now I'm doing it anyways :)
